name: get_food_item_by_id
description: Fetches details for one food item by FDC ID.

format.desciption: Response format, 'abridged' for an abridged set of elements, 'full' for all elements (default).

nutrients.desciption: List of up to 25 nutrient numbers (ids) to include in the response. Only those nutrients specified will be returned.

name: get_multiple_food_items_by_ids
description: Fetches details for multiple food items using input FDC IDs.

fdcIds.desciption: List of FDC ids of the foods.

format.desciption: Response format, 'abridged' for an abridged set of elements, 'full' for all elements (default).

nutrients.desciption: List of up to 25 nutrient numbers (ids) to include in the response. Only those nutrients specified will be returned.

name: get_food_lists
description: Returns a paged list of foods, in the 'abridged' format.

dataType.desciption: Filter on dataType. Allowed values: 'Branded', 'Foundation', 'Survey (FNDDS)', 'SR Legacy'.

pageSize.desciption: Number of foods to include on a page.

pageNumber.desciption: Page number of the foods to return.

sortBy.desciption: Sort on a field. Allowed values: 'lowercaseDescription.keyword', 'dataType.keyword', 'fdcId','publishedDate'.

name: search_foods
description: Returns a list of foods that matched search (query) keywords.

query.desciption: Search terms to use to search for foods.

dataType.desciption: Filter on dataType. Allowed values: 'Branded', 'Foundation', 'Survey (FNDDS)', 'SR Legacy'.

pageSize.desciption: Number of foods to include on a page.

pageNumber.desciption: Page number of the foods to return.

sortBy.desciption: Sort on a field. Allowed values: 'lowercaseDescription.keyword', 'dataType.keyword', 'fdcId','publishedDate'.

brandOwner.desciption: Filter results based on the brand owner of the food. Only applies to Branded Foods.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.desciption: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
